model

Class TileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.TileManager

  • public class TileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which manages the behavior of Tiles in the game Tile Assets are loaded in this class instead of in Assets for better organization Tile behavior is handled in this class instead of in the GameState class because the TileManager contains data about every Tile
    Author:
    Spencer Yoder

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  TileManager.Crystal 
      private class  TileManager.GrassTile 
      private class  TileManager.LockedTile
      The tiles outside the range of the crystal at the top of the tower Cannot be interacted with, serve as a fog of war
      private class  TileManager.TileGrid
      A 30x20 grid of Tiles.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Component breakIndicator 
      private TileManager.TileGrid home
      The TileGrid which occupies the screen TEMPORARY: the final game is planned to contain smooth scrolling so multiple TileGrids may be on screen at a given time

      The LayerManager to which the TileManager will draw the Tiles
